body_html:
@kaufManu The error message in your original post comes from a ScatterNd op which is the gradient code for the gather_nd op in your example.

The shape validation code for scatter_nd was changed recently. @ebrevdo - could you take a look at this please?
body_text:

The shape validation code for scatter_nd was changed recently.  @ebrevdo - could you take a look at this please?
body:
@kaufManu The error message in your original post comes from a ScatterNd op which is the gradient code for the gather_nd op in your example.  

The shape validation code for scatter_nd was changed recently.  @ebrevdo - could you take a look at this please?
